Header: Countrydoes not need foreign interference; Ven. Bengamuwe Nalaka Thera
Content: The Ven. Bengamuwe Nalaka Thera has said that the country does not need foreign interference. Addressing a news conference summoned by the Global Sri Lanka Forum he said that solutions to the political issues of the country can be found internally. Several other representatives also addressed the news briefing. Ven. Bengamuwe Nalaka Thera said that a political revolution was created in 2015. It was a conspiracy. There was foreign interference in it. The US directly spent money on it. Foreign countries waged an untiring attempt to halt the suppression of terrorism. They impressed on then President Mahinda Rajapaksa. But he did not take any notice of it. People who voted against him on January 08th and August 17th are now repenting. Western countries are being use to destroy country that listen to them. The people of this country want to live in peace. The people rise up when action is being taken such moves. The Ven. Nalaka Thera said that the removal of Ranil is a blessing for the country. Attorney Gemunu Karunaratne of the Global Sri Lanka Forum mentioned that what they should to is to respond to the ghosts and defeat them. Neil de Silva of the Global Sri Lanka Forum said that Sri Lanka has the authority to take its own decisions if it is a sovereign country and not outsiders.
